E-mail: as\farma1@csir.co.za, \bv\fuysst\t\tn@csir.co.za, tinus.pr\ttorius@up.ac.za \tbs\brac\b Human lan\bua\b\t t\tc\fnolo\bi\ts (HLT) can play a vital rol\t in brid\bin\b t\f\t di\bital divid\t and t\fus t\f\t HLT fi\tld \fas b\t\tn r\tco\bnis\td as a priority ar\ta by t\f\t Sout\f African \bov\trnm\tnt. W\t pr\ts\tnt our work on conductin\b a t\tc\fnolo\by audit on t\f\t Sout\f African HLT landscap\t across t\f\t country’s \tl\tv\tn official lan\bua\b\ts. T\f\t proc\tss and t\f\t instrum\tnts \tmploy\td in conductin\b t\f\t audit ar\t d\tscrib\td and an ov\trvi\tw of t\f\t various compl\tm\tntary approac\f\ts us\td in t\f\t r\tsults’ analysis is provid\td. W\t find t\fat a numb\tr of HLT lan\bua\b\t r\tsourc\ts (LRs) ar\t availabl\t in SA but t\f\ty ar\t of a v\try basic and \txploratory natur\t. L\tssons l\tarnt in conductin\b a t\tc\fnolo\by audit in a youn\b and multilin\bual cont\txt ar\t also discuss\td.

sections.title: 1. In\broduc\b\fon
paragraphs: B\tsid\ts t\f\t \bov\trnm\tnt as a major rol\t-play\tr/fund\tr, t\f\t curr\tnt \fuman lan\bua\b\t t\tc\fnolo\bi\ts (HLT) landscap\t in Sout\f Africa consists mostly of a r\tlativ\tly youn\b r\ts\tarc\f and d\tv\tlopm\tnt (R&D) community (univ\trsiti\ts and sci\tnc\t councils), and a \fandful of privat\t compani\ts. T\f\t R&D a\b\tnda for HLT in Sout\f Africa is by and lar\b\t uncoordinat\td, and is \tit\f\tr acad\tmic-driv\tn (\t.\b. lin\buists, or comput\tr sci\tntists wit\f an HLT int\tr\tst), and/or of a \fi\b\fly pra\bmatic natur\t (\t.\b. mak\t som\tt\fin\b t\fat works w\tll \tnou\b\f for its purpos\t, wit\fout \txt\tnsiv\t docum\tntation or distribution plans).  D\tspit\t a numb\tr of \tfforts by \bov\trnm\tnt and t\f\t R&D community, Sout\f Africa \fas not y\tt b\t\tn abl\t to maximis\t on t\f\t opportuniti\ts of HLT and cr\tat\t a t\frivin\b HLT industry. On\t of t\f\t k\ty c\fall\tn\b\ts is t\f\t p\trc\tiv\td fra\bm\tntation of t\f\t R&D activiti\ts in t\fis domain: t\f\tr\t is insuffici\tnt codifi\td knowl\td\b\t about \txistin\b Sout\f African lan\bua\b\t r\tsourc\ts (LRs) and applications. H\tnc\t, in 2009 t\f\t Sout\f African National HLT N\ttwork (NHN) – an informal onlin\t community of Sout\f African HLT rol\t-play\trs – und\trtook a lar\b\t-scal\t t\tc\fnolo\by audit for t\f\t HLT landscap\t in Sout\f Africa (\f\tnc\tfort\f SAHLTA).  In t\f\t n\txt s\tction w\t d\tscrib\t r\tlat\td work, in s\tction 3 w\t pr\ts\tnt an ov\trvi\tw of t\f\t SAHLTA proc\tss and instrum\tnts us\td. A concis\t ov\trvi\tw of som\t of our r\tsults is pr\ts\tnt\td in s\tction 4, w\fil\t s\tction 5 \biv\ts dir\tctions for futur\t work.

sections.title: 2. Rela\bed Work
paragraphs: In t\f\t int\trnational fi\tld of HLT, a numb\tr of ‘t\tc\fnolo\by audit’-lik\t \tfforts \fav\t b\t\tn und\trtak\tn. T\f\t \tarli\tst of suc\f formal audits was t\f\t Dutc\f HLT surv\ty (Binn\tnpoort\t et al., 2002), w\fic\f appli\td Krauw\tr’s (1998) conc\tpt of t\f\t ‘basic lan\bua\b\t r\tsourc\t kit’ (BLaRK) to conduct a fi\tld surv\ty for Dutc\f LRs. Ov\tr t\f\t past f\tw y\tars, t\f\t BLaRK conc\tpt and t\f\t Dutc\f surv\ty \fav\t inspir\td HLT surv\tys for a f\tw ot\f\tr lan\bua\b\ts, includin\b Arabic (carri\td out by NEMLAR and MEDAR; Ma\t\baard et al.: 2006, 2009), Sw\tdis\f (El\tnius et al., 2008) and Bul\barian (Simov et al., 2004). T\f\t BLaRK conc\tpt \fas also b\t\tn broad\tn\td to cat\tr for advanc\td HLT d\tv\tlopm\tnt t\frou\b\f t\f\t Ext\tnd\td Lan\bua\b\t R\tsourc\t Kit (Map\tlli et al., 2003) and cond\tns\td to an \tntry-l\tv\tl BLaRK, t\trm\td t\f\t BLaRK\ttt\t (Krauw\tr, 2006) for s\tv\tr\tly und\tr-r\tsourc\td lan\bua\b\ts.

sections.title: 3. Process and Ins\brumen\bs  3.1 Term\fnology, aud\f\b cr\f\ber\fa and cursory \fnven\bory
paragraphs: W\t comm\tnc\td by d\tv\tlopin\b an HLT audit t\trminolo\by list to \tstablis\f t\f\t nom\tnclatur\t, taxonomy and d\tscriptions for t\f\t data, modul\ts and applications to b\t us\td in t\f\t audit (and t\f\tr\tby cr\tatin\b a common fram\t of r\tf\tr\tnc\t). W\filst t\f\t Dutc\f and Arabic \tfforts provid\td a us\tful point of d\tpartur\t, som\t adaptation was r\tquir\td for t\f\t Sout\f African cont\txt. For \txampl\t, t\f\t application cat\t\bori\ts d\tfin\td by Binn\tnpoort\t et al. (2002) w\tr\t t\f\t most r\tl\tvant on\ts for Dutc\f at t\fat mom\tnt in tim\t. W\t r\tfin\td t\f\ts\t takin\b into account t\f\t diff\tr\tnc\ts in t\f\t Sout\f African mark\tt n\t\tds and t\f\t curr\tnt l\tv\tl of t\tc\fnolo\bical advanc\tm\tnt of Sout\f African lan\bua\b\ts, \t.\b. cat\t\bori\ts for audio s\tarc\f, and r\tf\tr\tnc\t works w\tr\t add\td.  Our s\tcond st\tp involv\td d\tfinin\b an HLT inv\tntory crit\tria fram\twork t\fat sp\tcifi\td t\f\t crit\tria or dim\tnsions on w\fic\f t\f\t HLT compon\tnts would b\t audit\td and docum\tnt\td. H\tr\t, w\t clos\tly follow\td t\f\t Dutc\f and Arabic BLaRK \tfforts; \fow\tv\tr, w\t customis\td it to includ\t t\f\t most important and r\tl\tvant crit\tria for t\f\t Sout\f African cont\txt (s\t\t b\tlow). Concurr\tntly, w\t built a cursory inv\tntory to id\tntify \txistin\b HLT compon\tnts for \tac\f of t\f\t \tl\tv\tn Sout\f African lan\bua\b\ts, across t\f\t major HLT rol\t- play\trs in t\f\t country. As input, w\t us\td t\f\t pr\tliminary r\tsults of a pr\tvious informal 2008 mini-BLaRK surv\ty, and compl\tm\tnt\td t\fis wit\f w\tb-s\tarc\f\ts and consultations
wit\f a f\tw local HLT \txp\trts.

sections.title: 3.3 \tud\f\b ques\b\fonna\fre
paragraphs: T\f\t inv\tntory crit\tria fram\twork form\td t\f\t backbon\t for t\f\t audit qu\tstionnair\t (spr\tads\f\t\tt) w\fic\f consists of t\fr\t\t major s\tctions: data, modul\t and applications and includ\ts t\f\t most r\tl\tvant audit crit\tria for t\fat particular s\tction. Anot\f\tr s\tction, ‘Tools/Platforms’, was also add\td lat\tr to accommodat\t t\tc\fnolo\bi\ts t\fat ar\t typically lan\bua\b\t-ind\tp\tnd\tnt, or aid t\f\t d\tv\tlopm\tnt of HLTs (\t.\b. annotation or corpus s\tarc\fin\b tools). Prior to roll-out t\f\t qu\tstionnair\t was pilot\td wit\f a f\tw HLT \txp\trts; t\fis prov\td to b\t most valuabl\t in id\tntifyin\b information fi\tlds t\fat could b\t pot\tntially misint\trpr\tt\td. To furt\f\tr aid participants (and stimulat\t r\tspons\t rat\ts), \txampl\t \tntri\ts t\fat illustrat\t \fow to r\tcord information w\tr\t provid\td for \tac\f cat\t\bory.  T\f\t audit qu\tstionnair\t was s\tnt to all major HLT rol\t-play\trs in t\f\t country. Or\banisations approac\f\td w\tr\t classifi\td as primary (univ\trsiti\ts, sci\tnc\t councils, compani\ts-15) or s\tcondary (national l\txico\brap\fy units, \bov\trnm\tnt d\tpartm\tnts-12) participants, bas\td on t\f\tir \fistorical cor\t HLT comp\tt\tnc\t in R&D. Participants w\tr\t s\tnt a list of t\f\t HLT compon\tnts id\tntifi\td at t\f\tir institution (as id\tntifi\td in t\f\t cursory inv\tntory), and w\tr\t r\tqu\tst\td to fill out all s\tctions for t\f\t \tl\tv\tn lan\bua\b\ts. All primary participants w\tr\t paid a minimal \fonorarium to comp\tnsat\t for t\f\t consid\trabl\t \tffort t\fat was r\tquir\td from t\f\tm.

sections.title: 3.4 Da\ba analys\fs
paragraphs: W\t \txp\trim\tnt\td wit\f various (subj\tctiv\t \t.\b. ind\tx\ts) ways to quantify t\f\t data, to r\tpr\ts\tnt it in a “consumabl\t”, bird’s \ty\t-vi\tw format and provid\t an impr\tssionistic vi\tw of t\f\t HLT landscap\t in Sout\f Africa. T\f\t final st\tp in our audit proc\tss involv\td an inv\tntory \bap analysis, w\fic\f id\tntifi\td t\f\t \baps b\ttw\t\tn t\f\t curr\tnt status of HLT compon\tnts in Sout\f Africa, and t\f\t prioritis\td Sout\f African HLT compon\tnts (as id\tntifi\td durin\b t\f\t works\fop). T\fis inv\tntory \bap analysis could b\t \fi\b\fly informativ\t for futur\t road-mappin\b \tx\trcis\ts, as w\tll as to imm\tdiat\tly id\tntify ar\tas or lan\bua\b\ts t\fat s\fould r\tc\tiv\t sp\tcial att\tntion (s\t\t b\tlow).

sections.title: 4. Resul\bs and D\fscuss\fon
paragraphs: Du\t to t\f\t limit\td scop\t of t\fis pap\tr, w\t pr\ts\tnt \f\tr\t only a \b\tn\tral ov\trvi\tw of som\t of our r\tsults.

sections.title: 4.1 The Sou\bh \tfr\fcan HLT landscape
paragraphs: In ord\tr to compar\t t\f\t stat\t of HLT d\tv\tlopm\tnt for all \tl\tv\tn lan\bua\b\ts, w\t cr\tat\td t\f\t ‘HLT Lan\bua\b\t Ind\tx’, an impr\tssionistic ind\tx t\fat r\tlativ\tly ranks lan\bua\b\ts bas\td on t\f\t total quantity of HLT activity wit\fin a lan\bua\b\t, as w\tll as t\f\t sta\b\t of maturity and acc\tssibility of t\f\tir HLT LRs and applications.  Fi\bur\t 1 d\tpicts t\f\t ‘HLT Lan\bua\b\t Ind\tx’ for t\f\t Sout\f African lan\bua\b\ts. It s\fows t\fat Afrikaans is by far t\f\t most d\tv\tlop\td lan\bua\b\t in Sout\f Africa wit\f r\t\bard to LRs and applications, follow\td by t\f\t local v\trnacular of En\blis\f (wit\f a si\bnificant diff\tr\tnc\t b\ttw\t\tn t\f\t two). T\fis pictur\t is sk\tw\td by t\f\t fact t\fat v\try littl\t work on Sout\f African En\blis\f is r\tquir\td wit\fin t\f\t t\txt domain, w\fic\f m\tans t\fat Sout\f African En\blis\f will almost always only b\t m\tasur\td in t\trms of activity r\tlat\td to sp\t\tc\f t\tc\fnolo\bi\ts. IsiZulu, isiX\fosa, S\tp\tdi, S\ttswana and S\tsot\fo (t\f\t fiv\t African lan\bua\b\ts in Sout\f Africa wit\f t\f\t most nativ\t sp\tak\trs) follow b\t\find En\blis\f; t\f\t two N\buni lan\bua\b\ts (isiZulu and isiX\fosa) \fav\t sli\b\ftly mor\t activity in t\f\t fi\tld of HLT, compar\td to t\f\t Sot\fo lan\bua\b\ts (S\tp\tdi, S\ttswana and S\tsot\fo). T\fis can b\t attribut\td to t\f\t fact t\fat isiZulu and isiX\fosa ar\t by far t\f\t two lar\b\tst lan\bua\b\ts in Sout\f Africa, us\td in a vari\tty of domains and in various provinc\ts – and t\fus oft\tn of lar\b\tr comm\trcial and/or acad\tmic int\tr\tst.  At t\f\t tail-\tnd ar\t t\f\t l\tss\tr-us\td lan\bua\b\ts suc\f as Ts\fiv\tnda, Siswati, isiNd\tb\tl\t, Xitson\ba (lan\bua\b\t ind\tp\tnd\tnt it\tms ar\t also includ\td in t\f\t ind\tx, ri\b\ft at t\f\t \tnd). T\f\ts\t four lan\bua\b\ts si\bnificantly la\b b\t\find in t\trms of HLT activity; t\f\t majority of it\tms availabl\t for t\f\ts\t lan\bua\b\ts w\tr\t d\tv\tlop\td quit\t r\tc\tntly, and ar\t mainly du\t to t\f\t Sout\f African \bov\trnm\tnt’s inv\tstm\tnt in t\f\ts\t lan\bua\b\ts.  S\tcondly, w\t also d\tv\tlop\td an ‘HLT Compon\tnt Ind\tx’ t\fat provid\ts an alt\trnativ\t p\trsp\tctiv\t of t\f\t quantity of activity takin\b plac\t wit\fin \tac\f of t\f\t data, modul\ts, and applications cat\t\bori\ts on a HLT compon\tnt \broupin\b l\tv\tl (\t.\b. pronunciation r\tsourc\ts); t\fis allows HLT practition\trs to asc\trtain ar\tas w\f\tr\t furt\f\tr work is r\tquir\td across t\f\t diff\tr\tnt lan\bua\b\ts. Fi\bur\t 2 (s\t\t \tnd of pap\tr) illustrat\ts t\f\t HLT Compon\tnt Ind\tx for modul\ts.  For \txampl\t, from t\fis fi\bur\t, a fundin\b a\b\tncy could d\tduc\t t\fat mon\ty s\fould rat\f\tr b\t inv\tst\td in, for \txampl\t, syntactic analysis, t\fan in \brap\f\tm\t-to-p\fon\tm\t conv\trsion; or t\fat sp\tcial att\tntion s\fould b\t \biv\tn to morp\folo\bical analysis of S\tsot\fo, Xitson\ba and Ts\fiv\tnda. It s\fould b\t not\td t\fat t\f\t r\tlativ\t siz\t of a bubbl\t do\ts not n\tc\tssarily indicat\t t\fat t\tc\fnolo\bi\ts in t\fat s\tction or for t\fat lan\bua\b\t ar\t matur\t – it is m\tr\tly an indication of t\tc\fnolo\bi\ts and t\f\t Sout\f African lan\bua\b\ts r\tlativ\t to \tac\f ot\f\tr (and also not r\tlativ\t to ot\f\tr world lan\bua\b\ts).  Similar to t\f\t abov\t r\tsults and r\tpr\ts\tntations, w\t \fav\t also d\tv\tlop\td a maturity ind\tx, an acc\tssibility ind\tx, a d\ttail\td HLT inv\tntory analysis (p\tr sub-cat\t\bory wit\fin data, modul\ts, applications), and an inv\tntory \bap analysis (s\t\t S\farma Grov\tr (2009) for t\f\t compr\t\f\tnsiv\t r\tsults).  Bas\td on t\f\ts\t, our ov\tr-all impr\tssion of t\f\t Sout\f African HLT landscap\t is t\fat v\try f\tw basic LRs and applications \txist across all \tl\tv\tn lan\bua\b\ts; it is \tsp\tcially t\f\t four small\tst lan\bua\b\ts t\fat la\b far b\t\find in t\trms of HLT d\tv\tlopm\tnt. It is also cl\tar t\fat t\f\tr\t ar\t a \br\tat many ar\tas t\fat li\t fallow across all t\f\t Sout\f African lan\bua\b\ts in t\trms of t\f\t vari\tty, numb\tr and maturity of it\tms, \tsp\tcially compar\td to ot\f\tr world lan\bua\b\ts.

sections.title: 4.2 \tbou\b \bhe aud\f\b process
paragraphs: B\tsid\ts t\f\t audit findin\bs, w\t also l\tarnt a numb\tr of l\tssons about \fow an HLT audit s\fould b\t conduct\td, \tsp\tcially in a youn\b and multilin\bual cont\txt.  Data coll\tction t\frou\b\f t\f\t audit qu\tstionnair\t prov\td to b\t a major burd\tn. Many participants, alt\fou\b\f activ\t rol\t-play\trs in t\f\t fi\tld, provid\td only basic information and \fad to b\t prompt\td p\trsonally in t\f\t post-qu\tstionnair\t p\fas\t. Alt\fou\b\f t\fis is common in r\ts\tarc\f, a numb\tr of sp\tcific r\tasons for t\fis slow/low r\tspons\t could b\t id\tntifi\td. W\t r\tcall t\fat for t\f\t Dutc\f BLaRK, a c\f\tcklist approac\f was follow\td and a numb\tr of fi\tld work\trs w\tr\t us\td to \bat\f\tr information (Binn\tnpoort\t, 2002). T\f\t financial scop\t of t\fis audit did not allow t\f\t luxury of fi\tld work\trs, and w\t t\f\tr\tfor\t \fad to us\t a qu\tstionnair\t inst\tad. W\t draw t\f\t conclusion t\fat t\f\t audit qu\tstionnair\t may \fav\t b\t\tn too compr\t\f\tnsiv\t in t\trms of t\f\t numb\tr of information fi\tlds (dim\tnsions) r\tquir\td.  Ma\t\baard et al. (2009) \txp\tri\tnc\td similar c\fall\tn\b\ts in t\f\tir most r\tc\tnt Arabic BLaRK \tffort. Comparin\b our \txp\tri\tnc\ts, w\t conj\tctur\t t\fat t\f\ts\t c\fall\tn\b\ts aris\t b\tcaus\t m\tasurin\b quality and ot\f\tr subj\tctiv\t dim\tnsions is a tim\t-consumin\b, (oft\tn) costly and \tffortful proc\tss, r\tquirin\b d\tdicat\td \fuman r\tsourc\ts. How\tv\tr, w\t do b\tli\tv\t t\fat it is wort\f t\f\t inv\tstm\tnt, sinc\t t\f\t valu\t of an LR s\fould tak\t into account s\tv\tral audit dim\tnsions; for a participant to m\tr\tly stat\t t\fat a c\trtain LR \txists for a c\trtain lan\bua\b\t, do\ts not \biv\t an impr\tssion of \fow matur\t t\fis LR is, and could t\f\tr\tfor\t sk\tw t\f\t r\tsults if on\t wants to \b\tt an impr\tssion of an HLT landscap\t.  T\f\t abov\t-m\tntion\td issu\ts warrant furt\f\tr inv\tsti\bations in t\f\t optimisation of data coll\tction approac\f\ts (int\trvi\tws, fi\tld work\trs, w\tb-bas\td qu\tstionnair\ts), and t\f\t m\tasur\tm\tnt of t\f\t valu\t of an LR in ord\tr to build a us\tful HLT inv\tntory.  In addition, w\t also \txp\tri\tnc\td t\fat d\tspit\t mon\ttary inc\tntiv\ts, t\f\t r\tspons\t rat\t was in som\t cas\ts rat\f\tr slow/low. Only aft\tr \txplainin\b t\f\t valu\t of an audit – its findin\bs and t\f\t possibility of a national HLT databas\t t\fat captur\ts t\fis information (fr\t\tly availabl\t for t\f\tir p\trusal) – did participation b\tcom\t mor\t activ\t. T\fis r\tluctanc\t may b\t possibly ascrib\td to factors suc\f as t\f\t lack of a s\far\td, co\f\tr\tnt vision on t\f\t pot\tntial of a stron\b HLT R&D industry in a youn\b R&D community.  In \findsi\b\ft, w\t \fav\t l\tarnt t\fat suc\f audits s\fould follow a bottom-up approac\f: if t\f\t community do\tsn’t s\far\t an und\trstandin\b of t\f\t valu\t and n\t\td of t\f\t audit (\t.\b. a national databas\t, or t\f\t pot\tntial to \b\tt fundin\b), t\f\t proc\tss is \famp\tr\td consid\trably.
